interfacelanguages: 25 (English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Portuguese, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Greek, Russian, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Romanian, Ukraine, Turkish, Arabic, Thai, Simplified/Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese)
shutterspeeds: 1/8000 to 1/60 sec., X-sync at 1/250 sec. 1/8000 to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
viewfinderinformation: AF information (AF points, focus confirmation light), Exposure information (Shutter speed, aperture, ISO speed, AE lock, exposure level, spot metering circle, exposure warning), Flash information (Flash-ready, flash exposure compensation, high-speed sync, FE lock, red-eye reduction light), Image information (Highlight tone priority, Monochrome shooting, maximum burst, white balance correction, CF card information), Composition information (Grid, electronic level), Battery check
magnification: Approx. 1.0x (-1m-1 with 50mm lens at infinity)/29.4° angle of view
externalflashsettings: Flash function settings, Flash C.Fn settings
printableimages: JPEG images compliant to Design rule for Camera File System (DPOF printing possible) and RAW/sRAW images captured with the EOS 7D
label2: JPEG images compliant to Design rule for Camera File System (DPOF printing possible) and
label3: RAW/sRAW images captured with the EOS 7D
label6: Exact file sizes depend on the subject, ISO speed, Picture Style, etc.
compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses including EF-S lenses (35mm-equivalent focal length is approx. 1.6x the lens focal length)
recordingmedia: CF Card Type I and II, UDMA-compliant CF cards, via external media (USB v.2.0 hard drive, via optional Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E5A)
flashcoverage: 15mm lens angle of view (equivalent to approx. 24mm in 135 format)
camerausersettings: Register under Mode Dial's C1, C2 and C3 positions
